ai-vv71:1.1_0: “This one whose mind is freed from stones,
ai-vv71:2.1_0: he is pleased with the god.
ai-vv71:2.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv71:3.1_0: “In humans, I was a human being.
ai-vv71:3.3_0: I saw the monk whose stainless state,
ai-vv71:4.1_0: I gave a share to him,
ai-vv71:5.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv71:6.1_0: The seventh setting aside the cooking of the Sattukas
